long_description: The Manduko eKO Lite 4mm Yoga Mat offers unparalleled grip to perform even in the sweatiest of conditions. In addition to its superior grip, the mat provides exceptional comfort and cushioning. Made from biodegradable, non-Amazon harvested, natural tree rubber, this durable yoga mat contains no PVC or toxic plasticizers. 99% latex-free construction is ideal for most people with latex sensitivities. The Manduko eKO Lite 4mm Yoga Mat features Tri Layer Technology for optimal combination of grip, durability and slip-resistance.
short_description: The Manduko eKO Lite 4mm Yoga Mat offers unparalleled grip to perform even in the sweatiest of conditions. In addition to its superior grip, the mat provides exceptional comfort and cushioning.
